content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Juan, thank you for your interest in my apartment. Based on current market rates, I would like to propose a rental price of €1,500 per month. This is a fair price given the size and location of the apartment. Is this price acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 1500 Euro. Thank you for your offer.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Great, I'm glad you found the price acceptable. I'm happy to sign the lease agreement and move forward with the rental process. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to let me know.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
TERMINATE.

I have found another apartment that is more affordable for me. Thank you for your time.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Understood, I apologize for the inconvenience. I understand that everyone has different budgets and priorities. If you have any further questions or need to discuss anything else, feel free to reach out to me. Have a great day!
name: Heinrich Heine
